name: 1inch
description: 1inch exchange is a decentralized exchange (DEX) aggregator. It helps users discover the best trade prices for tokens. Instead of swapping tokens from a single DEX liquidity pool, 1inch aggregates swaps across different pools and suggests the most efficient trade.

en.name: 1inch
en.description: 1inch exchange is a decentralized exchange (DEX) aggregator. It helps users discover the best trade prices for tokens. Instead of swapping tokens from a single DEX liquidity pool, 1inch aggregates swaps across different pools and suggests the most efficient trade.

fr.name: 1inch
fr.description: 1inch Exchange est un agrégateur d'échange décentralisé (DEX). Il aide les utilisateurs à découvrir les meilleurs prix des jetons. Au lieu d'échanger des jetons à partir d'une seule pool de liquidités , 1inch regroupe les swaps entre différentes pools et suggère l'échange le plus efficace.

es.name: 1inch
es.description: 1inch exchange es un agregador de exchanges descentralizados (DEX). Ayuda a los usuarios a descubrir los mejores precios comerciales para los tokens. En lugar de intercambiar tokens de un solo pool de liquidez, 1inch combina intercambios entre diferentes pools y sugiere el más eficiente.

de.name: 1inch
de.description: 1inch exchange is a decentralized exchange (DEX) aggregator. It helps users discover the best trade prices for tokens. Instead of swapping tokens from a single DEX liquidity pool, 1inch aggregates swaps across different pools and suggests the most efficient trade.

pt.name: 1inch
pt.description: 1inch exchange é um agregador de exchanges descentralizadas (DEX). Ele ajuda usuários a descobrir os melhores preços para os tokens. Ao invés de fazer a troca dos tokens no pool de liquidez de apenas uma DEX, 1inch agrega as trocas entre diferentes pools e sugere a mais eficiente negociação.

el.name: 1inch
el.description: 1inch exchange is a decentralized exchange (DEX) aggregator. It helps users discover the best trade prices for tokens. Instead of swapping tokens from a single DEX liquidity pool, 1inch aggregates swaps across different pools and suggests the most efficient trade.

tr.name: 1inch
tr.description: 1inch exchange, merkezi olmayan bir takas (DEX) toplayıcısıdır. Kullanıcıların token'ler için en iyi takas fiyatlarını keşfetmesine yardımcı olur. Tek bir DEX likidite havuzundan token'leri takas etmek yerine, 1inch takasları farklı havuzlar arasında toplar ve en verimli takası önerir.

vi.name: 1inch
vi.description: 1inch exchange is a decentralized exchange (DEX) aggregator. It helps users discover the best trade prices for tokens. Instead of swapping tokens from a single DEX liquidity pool, 1inch aggregates swaps across different pools and suggests the most efficient trade.

zh.name: 1inch
zh.description: 1inch 是一个去中心化交易平台（DEX）聚合器。它可以提供用户最佳的交易价格。与其在单个 DEX 的流动性池中做代币交换，1inch 聚合不同池的交换并可以提供最高效的交易的建议。

hi.name: 1inch
hi.description: 1inch exchange is a decentralized exchange (DEX) aggregator. It helps users discover the best trade prices for tokens. Instead of swapping tokens from a single DEX liquidity pool, 1inch aggregates swaps across different pools and suggests the most efficient trade.

ja.name: 1inch
ja.description: 1inch exchangeは分散型取引所（DEX）アグリケーターです。ユーザーはトークンの最適な取引価格を探すことができます。1inchは一つのDEXの流動性プールからトークンをスワップするのではなく、異なるプール間のスワップを集約し、最も効率的な取引を提案します。
